description: Try our easy to follow White Christmas Fruit & Nut Chocolate recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: White Christmas,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Egg free,Chocolate treats,Quick & easy dessert,Banana,Halal,Microwave,Christmas,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Chocolate
name: White Christmas Fruit & Nut Chocolate Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Melt chocolate in microwave in 30 second intervals, for two minutes or until half-melted. Stir half-melted chocolate by hand to melt the remaining.
Pour melted chocolate into clean shallow baking tray (see tip) and sprinkle with toppings. Refrigerate for one hour or until completely firm.
Remove from fridge when firm. Turn tray upside down over a chopping board and tap firmly on the bench to release the chocolate. Break into shards to serve.
